room descriptions.intro_text_long: Welcome to Byss. A world wracked with constanst storms. Nothing but rain wherever you any attempt to land, nor do there really appear to be any reliable places of shelter. Your suit can handle it, and thus it will have to do.
room descriptions.intro_text_short: Welcome back to Byss, where the rain has not, and likely never will abate. Back to where you left off.

geode.description: This geode is stunning to look at. Despite the lack of sun, the brilliance of the colors is a marvel to behold.

overhanging shelf.description: You've managed to find a decent sized overhaning shelf to land under. It's not stopping the rain from falling on you or your ship, but it is reducing it. You can see a wall nearby, and after than a well.

colossal wall.description: Rain sluices down this unfathomable monument. Though you could easily see both ends shortly before landing, on the ground it simply disappears into the heights above you.

deep well.description: Your brain calls it a well, but what scans you could make tell you this is an incredibly deep sinkhole, essentially. You have no interest in falling in if you can help it.
